Infrastructure that scales

I specialize in building and maintaining reliable systems that power critical services. At LG Uplus, I work on infrastructure automation, monitoring solutions, and incident response for one of South Korea's leading telecommunications providers.

My approach combines proactive monitoring, rigorous testing, and pragmatic solutions to ensure systems remain available and performant under any condition.
